title: Skins Suggestions
body: This is a forum where all summoners would like to post skin names and also send in pictures that have been drawn for riot. For say (this isnt my idea but) if you make a skin like something like what? Heartseeker Nidalee or something, just try draw (if you can). But yea im currently drawing a few right now, please just read this and please post any ideas or any pictures that would make riot think if they would add in the skins.

replies.body:
Death Reaver Team,
Top- Death Reaver Zed
Jung- Death Rever FiddleSticks
Mid- Death Reaver Katarina
Adc- Death Reaver Lucian
Supp Death Reaver morgana 
And  Justice Heros
Top- justice hero akali
Jung- justice hero  irelia
Mid- justice hero Kayle
Adc- Justice Hero Sivir
Supp- justice hero  soraka

Hm thats pretty good but i might have a tip something like a different support would be more best, nami is so innocent D:. shes just a fish who gets turned into sushi D:. Someone like soraka, lulu or morgana would be better. Great suggestions tho, if you can try draw it id love to see what it would look like :D.
I changed it and added justice heros

This looks good! I can also see this as a way for riot to make a promotional game with all rioters Justice Heroes vs Death Reavers,
I wonder how they could be made to look similar as part of the same skin group. good idea :)
Ty

Hey guys, i just started creating a few drawing on different champions, i actually put in the thought of drawing that, but anyway, i have thought on a new Ashe skin, i know there alot of them and Marauder just recently released. But im drawing things similiar to Blood Lord Vladimir but its not called blood lord, i was think of making Blood Reaper Ashe or Blood Shot, i dont make up good names but its all i can think of, thanks for reading this
sanguine arrow ashe
Hey thats a pretty good one just keep em coming and ill see which one ill choose
Btw, I can't draw or create for %%%% lol so u could if u want draw the skins I come up with good luck with my skin making quest
I drew an Atlantean Nami splash art idea :3 if thats okay
Nice! Love the detail hopefully riot sees this :D
thank you!
Hmm i think this might help you but you can actually i dunno might be able to send this to riot through e-mail and suggest it hope it does id love to see this ingame
i dont even know what their email is xD
You Responded quick, and that looks great did you make that or found it in images? I think riot might make it they did make a few atlantean skins so far :D.

I drew it :P it can be found in my fb page here https://www.facebook.com/542006589222736/photos/a.542013755888686.1073741828.542006589222736/793257484097644/?type=1&theater :) and thank you! praying the Riot senpai notices

Just click the image and itll take you there
You drew it NICE
thanks :)

You're missing Bikini Babe Urgot. Also, Suicide Bomber Jinx? That name, just no. How about Mad Bomber?
Cosmetic dr urgot...... Also sure I'll change it
Well this is my real acc that's my smurf

Holy Moly that's a lot! :D, seems you put some thought into this i have read them through and a lot  of them seem like great ideas i like the idea of Siv hd Ezreal but i  wouldn't know if riot would be able to use that or would want to, although i like the ideas some skins are already the base of the champion, for example: Wind Queen Janna, Drunk Gragas and  Mighty Jax.  Wind queen janna feels like the same as normal janna being the wind queen type, Gragas is always drunk but they could change hi to be looking a bit more drunk or suited to being in a pub drunk, with the jax one i can see wghere you are coming from but with jaximus and so on it seems that has been the main idea with him being mighty but there is some potentional if it goes towards a different style. but all the others seem like great ideas. Seems Good :D
Done
Well I'm thinking of a skin for every champ x5 so back to work ;P
Morbid Morgana
Exterminator twitch (red or yellow suit)with different poison couler

Oh yea i also forgot to add, i dont have the time to draw so much since.. highschool and things, its really stressful so i cant really get on this forum on mondays-thursdays just keep it going and ill read them soon!

Hi guys its me again im just wondering if anyone would help me have some suggestions on the actual look of ashe her self for blood shot ashe, im having a lot of trouble, also technoflame ill get to the skins you came up with after ashe since... im stuck on her frame look i got the arrow and quiver and the bow itself, if that is okay with you, im actually working on heartseeker nidalee as well
Well this is techno flame, TechnoFlame is my smurf :P
